product_name: Sea to Summit Insect Shield Bug Jacket and Mitts
long_description: The Sea To Summit Insect Shield Bug jacket and mitts create a barrier to block biting insects so you can enjoy all your outdoor activities. Fine polyester no-see-um mesh is lightweight and compact. EPA-registered, odorless Insect Shield(R) Repellent Apparel helps keep biting and potentially disease-carrying insects at bay. Insect Shield(R) Repellent Apparel is effective through 70 washes. Olive green jacket features a hood with a black see-through face panel for excellent protection; YKK zipper allows easy head access. Olive green mitts protect your hands from biting insects. Includes a small storage sack.
short_description: The Sea To Summit Insect Shield Bug jacket and mitts create a barrier to block biting insects so you can enjoy all your outdoor activities.
